title: Crossover: Sepp Blatter appeals FIFA suspension
text:
Crossover: Sepp Blatter appeals FIFA suspension 
CCTV.com Share this: Share on twitter Share on facebook Share on sinaweibo Share on email Font size: 
FIFA President Sepp Blatter has filed an official appeal against the decision to suspend him by FIFA's ethics committee. Blatter has been president of the world football governing body since 1998. The 79-year-old is currently facing a Swiss criminal investigation over corruption claims. For more, we are joined by our correspondent Dan Williams. 
Q1. Dan, tell us more details about Blatter's appeal. What did he say in it? 
Q2. FIFA's ruling council will next week discuss a possible emergency meeting over the corruption scandal. How is FIFA to manage this situation, especially now with Blatter's appeal? Related Videos
